title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 252 - Violation Hearing
content:

State Regulations
§ 252.1 - Violation officer
§ 252.2 - Function of the violation hearing
§ 252.3 - Procedure
§ 252.4 - Non-english speaking and sensorially disabled inmates
§ 252.5 - Dispositions at violation hearing
§ 252.6 - Appeal procedures
§ 252.7 - Discretionary review by superintendent

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 7, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 252

Statutory authority: Correction Law, §§70, 112

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
